# Summit Technology Affiliates
**datePublished:** 2026-02-13
**dateModified:** 2026-02-18

> Summit Technology Affiliates is a leader in managed print, mailing solutions, document automation, and managed IT services. Established in 1987, the company operates through a family of subsidiary brands across the United States, providing industry-leading equipment and tailored workflow solutions.


## Overview
- **Founded:** 1987 
- **Headquarters:** Edmond, Oklahoma
- **Service Areas:** Oklahoma, California, Iowa, Missouri, Kansas, Texas, and beyond.
- **Mission:** Empowering businesses with cutting-edge technology, ethical practices, and personalized support to drive efficiency and productivity.

## Core Services

### [Managed Print Services (MPS)](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/print/managed-print.html)
- Comprehensive management of office printer fleets. 
- Optimization of print workflows to reduce costs and environmental impact.
- Support for equipment ranging from small personal copiers to high-volume production machines.
- Automated toner replenishments and notices for copiers and printers.

### [Mailing & Shipping Solutions](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/mailing/mailroom-solutions.html)
- **Mailroom Automation:** Systems for processing, folding, inserting, and addressing mail.
- **Postage Meters:** Advanced meters like the iX-9 for efficient postage management.
- **Parcel Lockers:** [Secure smart locker systems](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/mailing/mail-parcel-lockers.html) for package management and retrieval.
- **Software:** Intelligent document output management (e.g., AIMS and S.M.A.R.T. solutions).

### [Document & Business Solutions](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/solutions/document-workflow-solutions.html)
- **Document Management:** Archive and retrieval systems, cloud DMS, and version control.
- **Workflow Automation:** Business process automation (BPA) and digital forms.   
- **Customer Journey Mapping:** Enhancing engagement through touchpoint analysis.
- **Scanning:** Modern high-speed scanners with text orientation and skew detection. 

### [Managed IT Services](https://summitsecureit.com/)
- Robust technology management, security, and ongoing infrastructure support.
- Hardware support and New Office Setup.
- Phone and VoIP Services.

## Product Categories

### Copiers & Printers
- [Office Multifunction Printers (MFPs)](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/print/office-mfps.html) (e.g., Toshiba e-STUDIO, Canon imageFORCE, Epson)
- [Small & Personal Copiers](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/print/small-personal-mfps.html) (e.g., Brother, Toshiba, Canon)
- [Production Printing Machines](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/print/light-production-mfps.html) (e.g., Canon imagePRESS V900) 
- [Wide Format Printers](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/print/wide-format-printers.html) (e.g., imagePROGRAF series)
- [Label & Receipt Printers](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/print/label-receipt-printers.html) (Thermal technology)
- [Document and Image Scanners](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/print/scanners.html)

### Mailing Equipment
- [Mail Machines & Postage Meters](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/mailing/mail-machines.html)
- [Folder Inserters](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/mailing/folder-inserters.html)
- [Direct Address & Envelope Printers](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/mailing/envelope-printers.html)
- [Mail & Parcel Lockers](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/mailing/mail-parcel-lockers.html)

### Business Software & Automation
- [Business Process Automation](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/solutions/business-process-automation.html)
- [Digital Forms](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/solutions/digital-forms.html)
- [Document Archive & Retrieval](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/solutions/document-archive-retrieval.html)
- [Customer Communication Management (CCM)](https://summitaffiliates.com/product-pages/solutions/customer-communication-management.html)

## Subsidiary Companies (The Summit Family)
- [Summit Business Systems & Summit Mailing](https://summitaffiliates.com/locations/okc.html): Oklahoma City (HQ), Springfield (MO).
- [JMP Office Technology](https://summitaffiliates.com/locations/jmp.html): Clovis (CA) and Sacramento (CA).
- [Midwest Office Technology (MOT)](https://summitaffiliates.com/locations/mot.html): Iowa and Kansas.
- [CCI Office Technology](https://summitaffiliates.com/locations/cci.html): Ventura (CA).

## Common Questions 
**What is managed print services (MPS)?**
 Managed Print Services (MPS) is the comprehensive management of a company's printer and copier fleet, including automated supply replenishment, proactive maintenance, and workflow optimization to reduce costs and improve efficiency.

**What makes our copiers and printers ideal for business?**
 Our office copiers are designed to efficiently handle a high volume of tasks, offering fast printing speeds, large paper capacities, and advanced scanning capabilities. They are robust, reliable, and easy to use, making them perfect for busy office environments.

**How can Postage Machines reduce mailing costs?
 Postage machines accurately measure and apply postage, avoiding overpayment on mail. Bulk mailing options and cost effective metering also contribute to significant postage savings over time.

**What are the key benefits of using Folder Inserter Machines?
Folder Inserter Machines automate and expedite the process of preparing mail. They efficiently fold, insert, and seal envelopes, enhancing productivity and accuracy in mail processing, especially for bulk mailing tasks.

**What are the key features of Digital Envelope Printers?
Our Digital Envelope Printers are equipped with advanced technology offering high speed printing, exceptional color accuracy, and the ability to handle various envelope sizes. They are designed for easy operation and efficient workflow integration, making them ideal for both high volume and customized printing needs.

**What areas do you serve?**
We primarily serve businesses in Oklahoma (including Edmond, Oklahoma City, Ardmore, Tulsa), California, Iowa, Missouri, Kansas, and Northern Texas, with the capacity to support national accounts.

**Can your automation solutions be customized for different business needs? 
Yes, our automation solutions are highly adaptable to meet the specific requirements of each business. We understand that every business is unique, and we work closely with you to develop customized solutions that align with your operational needs and objectives.

**How do you protect sensitive information in print and mail workflows?**
We put security at the forefront, offering comprehensize solutions such as PaperCut, uniFLOW, S.M.A.R.T, and more. These platforms are designed with compliance in mind to keep your business safe, offering practices such as secure print and audit logs. 

**How can you help us reduce overall print and mail costs?** 
Through right-sizing equipment, automated replenishment, waste reduction, bulk postage savings, and free workflow assessments, Summit drives efficiency with tools like PaperCut print management and modern mail systems.

## Key Resources
- [Schedule a Free Assessment](https://summitaffiliates.com/forms/schedule-assessment.html): 1-hour assessment for printers, workflows, or mailrooms.
- [Blog & Learning Center](https://summitaffiliates.com/blog-center/blog-center.html): Insights on PaperCut, security, and industry-specific tech (e.g. education, healthcare, law firms, and more).
- [Contact Us](https://summitaffiliates.com/forms/contact-us.html): Direct support and regional office information.
